destination.name: Paris
destination.funfacts: The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer due to thermal expansion of the metal.

destination.name: New York
destination.funfacts: New York City was the first capital of the United States.

destination.name: Tokyo
destination.funfacts: Tokyo is the world's largest metropolitan area, with over 37 million residents in the greater Tokyo area.

destination.name: Sydney
destination.funfacts: The Sydney Opera House has over 1 million roof tiles, each one unique.
